name: monorepo-micro-frontend
description: Monorepo 微前端应用 demo - Vue2 + qiankun

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:child1" "npm run dev:child2"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:child1 && npm run build:child2
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/main && npm install && cd ../child1 && npm install && cd ../child2 && npm install
